author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Gets a Boost From Political Uncertainty in Europe, Drop in Oil Prices
text:
The dollar rose against a broad range of currencies Friday, boosted by political uncertainty in Europe and a drop in oil prices.
The WSJ Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was recently up 0.3% to 87.30.
